description:
Great initiative from @balenciaga who has decided to open their platforms in the next few days to report and relay the information around the situation in Ukraine. Follow this link (also in bio) to donate now üëâüèº www.wfp.org/ 
#standwithukraine #stopthewar

No person should have to endure the terror of war. It is never acceptable. We stand with Ukraine, our friends and anyone impacted by acts of war. Luxury houses have the power to take action and now is the time to stand up and halt trade with Russia and #stopfundingthewar. 
‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä
RP: As the industry gathers to celebrate young talent at the @lvmhprize in Paris, remember that creativity can only thrive when there is peace. Right now, some of the previous nominees are sheltering from bomb attacks and fearing for their lives. Luxury fashion brands have power and influence ‚Äì we demand that they use it to stand up against the senseless violence of this invasion: EMBARGO ON RUSSIA NOW. We cannot accept business as usual.
#standwithukraine #stopfundingthewar 
‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä
Thank you @1granary #1granary @olyaolya for raising continued awareness for the industry.
‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä
We urge everyone to sign Fashion Unites Against War Open Letter - Link in Bio and please consider donating if you can to the links below.
‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä
https://www.gofundme.com/f/Support-Black-people-fleeing-Ukraine?utm_source=customer&utm_medium=copy_link_all&utm_campaign=m_pd+share-sheet
‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä‚†Ä
https://donatenow.wfp.org/ukraine-appeal/~my-donation

The World Food Programme (@worldfoodprogramme) is launching an emergency operation to provide food assistance for people fleeing the conflict inside Ukraine and in neighbouring countries.
.
You can join us in donating to the programme via their website: https://donatenow.wfp.org/ukraine-appeal/~my-donation?_ga=2.114683012.288277627.1646333210-710635370.1646333210
.
.
.
.
#ukraine #standwithukraine #worldfoodprogramme

According to the United Nations World Food Programme, the repercussions of the war in Ukraine will be felt well beyond its borders, aggravating hunger in some of the world‚Äôs worst hunger crises across Africa and Asia. Some of the world‚Äôs current hunger hotspots such as Afghanistan, Ethiopia, Syria and Yemen will be the most affected because of their dependency on wheat*. 

We are a skincare company founded by a humanitarian worker and co-founded by an experienced skincare expert. We believe that the private sector has a role to play in making the world better and we plan to contribute our ‚Äúdrop‚Äù through ethical and sustainable sourcing, advocacy and transparency. We plan to do so while making premium, safe and effective serums that feed skin for optimum skin nutrition. #skincare #beauty #unsdg #stopthewar #ukraine #russia

*Source: https://docs.wfp.org/api/documents/WFP-0000137463/download/

When conflict strikes, the production of food is impacted, which not only affects those in areas of conflict but beyond the borders of conflict too. üòî

In Ukraine, the exportation of many items are suspended. This includes things such as:

‚ùå Meat
‚ùå Livestock
‚ùå Salt + sugar
‚ùå Buckwheat, oats, millet, and rye

This will hit countries in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) the hardest. As regions already vulnerable to high food prices, conflict means food resources become even harder to attain and therefore prices will rise. üìà

Conflict has worldwide implications and unfortunately, this means worsening the global food crisis. When we work towards #Goal16 (Peace and Justice), we also help move one step closer to tackling food insecurity and therefore, #Goal2 (Zero Hunger). 

Learn more by checking out this article by @worldfoodprogramme:
https://www.wfp.org/stories/ukraine-war-more-countries-will-feel-burn-food-and-energy-price-rises-fuel-hunger-warns-wfp 
.
.
.
.
#stopwar #ukraine #war #food #hunger #goal16 #goal2 #globalgoals #fyp #explore #explorepage

Russia‚Äôs invasion of üá∫üá¶ Ukraine will cause food insecurity across the globe üåè. 44 million people in 38 countries are already on the edge of famine. This invasion affects everyone. You can find our more about the implications of this crisis on food security here https://www.wfp.org/publications/food-security-implications-ukraine-conflict or click the link in our bio üëÜ
